Title: Comings & Goings
Plot: Karen drags Hank to an end of the semester goodbye luncheon at Felicia?s. Hank realizes he?s walked into a hornet?s nest as Felicia, Jackie and Jill all gang up on him. The Hank bashing is interrupted when Richard Bates, the novelist / professor Hank replaced at the college, pays a surprise visit.
Writer: Gina Fattore, Daisy Gardner, Eva Amurri Martino
